abstract: Most of the reductions apply to the local phone business, which lost 1.6 million residential lines last year as customers switched to cable and wireless phone service.
snippet: Most of the reductions apply to the local phone business, which lost 1.6 million residential lines last year as customers switched to cable and wireless phone service.
lead_paragraph: AT&T said Friday that it would eliminate the jobs of about 4,650 workers, trimming the managerial ranks in its fading home phone business after more than $100 billion in acquisitions.
